text: this is Forrest hi every day for the
last 33 years he has run at least seven
miles and hiked three miles if you add
up the total distance he has run more
than a hundred and ten thousand miles on
foot a hundred and nine thousand seven
hundred sixty three to be exact which is
enough to circle around the equator six
times Rayna shine doesn't matter doesn't
matter Forrest is a Vietnam veteran who
lives with his lovely wife in Mesa
Arizona just 30 minutes from where I
grew up in Phoenix
they are both travelers at heart having
visited all 50 states and 67 countries
together I spent the last 10 days
getting to know him because we are
randomly paired on the same gene
ventures trip around Olivia he is as
inspiring as any person I've ever met
our alarm rings at 2:45 every morning we
do stretches these sit-ups get the legs
going
I do like a hundred of these and by 3:15
we're out on the road so what's his
inspiration for all of this
well I think it might have been some
individuals that I met while running
marathons an individual about 78 years
old I ran into him myself oh wow it's
great to meet you and how long have you
been running these that he had been
running for pretty close to 50 years so
I said well I hope when I get your age
I'll still be running and also I was
reading an article where a gentleman
just retired at 120 years old of running
marathons full marathons the 26.2 miles
and which you know I of course really
enjoy doing has he ever been injured
well a couple of scrapes but not really
any other injuries nothing is required
you know doctor's attention or you know
braces band-aids or any of those kinds
of things
is running the key to staying fit
forever running helps me to if I wake up
say with a headache as a result of
whatever when I run the headache goes
away I can be feeling bad or mentally
different situations associated with
your mental state running takes care of
that for me and I have some of the best
ideals while running I have had what's
called endorphins that you get and they
really do make you feel like you can run
forever
they ever just want to not stop running
what you're like damn I just ran 10
miles but I want to run 20 oh yes I've
had that feeling but I have other things
I need to do so you have a lighter
outside already I have a life outside of
running does he ever plan on stopping
never not unless but I guess I'll say
until I die I run into people out while
I'm running that have limps and they're
running so if they can run I can run
listening to for a story gives me
motivation to start running again if you
got my attention
but I just don't know if I'll ever catch
up all right drew I got to get running
now I'll see you later

alright I'm drew pinsky and if you like
